statements: DELETE FROM affiliate_marketers_tracking WHERE affiliate_id = 100 AND link_id = 200;
DELETE FROM affiliate_marketers_tracking WHERE id = 10 AND affiliate_id = 101

DELETE FROM Conversions WHERE affiliate_id = 1 AND conversion_amount > 1000;
